firstSection.title: UDocument – legal services in the field of real estate and business.
firstSection.paragraph: Our company provides legal services in the following areas:
servicesList: representation in civil, commercial, administrative, and criminal court cases
assistance with migration matters and license acquisition.

secondSection.title: Our Team
secondSection.paragraph: UDocument – a team of attorneys and lawyers with experience in real estate, legal support for transactions, and resolving a wide range of legal issues. We offer a personalized approach to each client.

cardsData.description: Offices in the UK, Turkey, Ukraine

thirdSection.title: Our Services
thirdSection.paragraph: Our team offers a wide range of legal services, from real estate consultations to legal documentation and assistance in complex situations. We provide reliable solutions for your business and real estate, ensuring legal support at every stage.

cardData.title: Business Legal Support
cardData.description: We offer comprehensive legal support for your business, including legal consultations, document preparation, and court representation. We assist with taxation, contracts, and corporate law issues.

cardData.title: Real Estate Services
cardData.description: Our experts provide complete legal and technical support in real estate: from document verification to transaction processing. We ensure the safety of your investments and compliance with legal standards.

aproachSection.description: Innovative Solutions for Real Estate Documentation
Reliable Protection of Your Rights and Interests

consultationSection.title: Expert Legal Assistance and Consultations
consultationSection.paragraph: Schedule a free consultation with our experienced lawyers to receive personalized advice on real estate, business, and other legal matters. We will help you find the optimal solutions for your legal needs.

contactsSection.paragraph: For consultations, please contact us using the following information:
contactsSection.title: Our Contacts

formContactSection.title: Write to Us
formContactSection.paragraph: For consultations, please contact us using the following information:

headingSection.title: Expert Legal and Real Estate Specialists
headingSection.paragraph: We provide high-quality legal consultations and services in the fields of real estate, business, and general law. Our team of experts is ready to help you resolve any legal issue quickly and professionally.

ourHistorySection.title: Our History and Commitment to Legal Excellence
ourHistorySection.paragraph: UDocument is a leading legal organization established to provide exceptional legal support in the areas of real estate, business, and general legal assistance. Dedicated to high standards, our highly qualified lawyers have been successfully resolving complex legal issues for clients for many years. Professionalism and a personal approach make us reliable partners for your legal needs.

ourTeamSection.title: Our Team of Experienced Lawyers
ourTeamSection.paragraph: Meet our team of professionals, each with extensive experience in various fields of law. We offer personalized consultations and comprehensive solutions to ensure successful legal support for your interests.

mainContent.title: Lawyer services
services: Property ownership registration for an apartment, house, or commercial premises (purchase-sale, certificates, investment contracts, etc.).
Obtaining and registering the owner's passport and identification code.
Legal support in commercial, administrative, civil, and criminal cases.

mainContent.title: Business legal support
services: Real estate purchase-sale contracts for your business.
Assistance in company registration, tax consultations, legal defense in courts, obtaining necessary licenses and permits, ongoing legal support for business operations.

mainContent.title: Migration services
services: Obtaining the necessary documents for property ownership abroad.

mainContent.title: Technical passport and reports preparation
services: Property ownership registration for an apartment, house, or commercial premises (purchase-sale, certificates, investment contracts, etc.).
Obtaining a technical passport or relevant reports.
Preparation of passports and identification codes for owners.

mainContent.title: Merging or dividing real estate objects
services: Property ownership registration for real estate objects.
Preparation and renewal of technical passports.
Assistance in obtaining the necessary documents and registering the owner.

mainContent.title: Property ownership registration
services: Preparation and submission of necessary documents for property ownership registration.
Owner passport and identification code registration.

thankyouPage.title: Thank you, we have received your request. A manager will contact you shortly.
